title: Optimization, molecular dynamics and quantum parameters simulations of Zingiber officinale rhizome as a green corrosion inhibitor
content:
Publication date: 30 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 18

Author(s): Olajire Samson Olanrele, Joseph Femi-Dagunro, Edwin Andrew Ofudje, Meri Algarni, Azza A. Al-Ghamdi, Reema H. Aldahiri, Mazen R. Alrahili, Ahad Amer Alsaiari
